name: NCD - Diagnosis and Treatment of Impotence
description: This policy outlines coverage for the diagnosis and treatment of sexual impotence. Treatment may be surgical (e.g., penile prosthesis implantation), medical, or psychotherapeutic. Specific limitations apply to treatments furnished to non-hospital inpatients in connection with a mental condition, triggering psychiatric service limitations.
